languages.text: "Ересь..." {n}Арджента смотрит на вытянутую фигуру со странной смесью гнева и тоски. Потом она опускает голову, ее лицо скрывается за прядями белых волос.{/n}
"Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ересь..." {n}Арджента смотрит на вытянутую фигуру со странной смесью гнева и тоски. Потом она опускает голову, ее лицо скрывается за прядями белых волос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair hides her face from you.{/n}

"Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}

languages.text: "Ketzerei ..." {n}Argenta betrachtet die große Gestalt mit einer eigentümlichen Mischung aus Wut und Traurigkeit. Dann senkt sie den Kopf, und ihr weißes Haar verdeckt ihr Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ketzerei ..." {n}Argenta betrachtet die große Gestalt mit einer eigentümlichen Mischung aus Wut und Traurigkeit. Dann senkt sie den Kopf, und ihr weißes Haar verdeckt ihr Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: « Hérésie... » {n}Argenta observe la silhouette élancée avec un étrange mélange de colère et de tristesse. Elle finit par baisser la tête, et ses cheveux blancs viennent cacher son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Hérésie... » {n}Argenta observe la silhouette élancée avec un étrange mélange de colère et de tristesse. Elle finit par baisser la tête, et ses cheveux blancs viennent cacher son visage.{/n}

languages.text: “异端恶行……”{n}阿洁塔看着眼前这个高大的声影，目光中充满了愤怒与悲伤。随后她低下了头，白发遮住了她的脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “异端恶行……”{n}阿洁塔看着眼前这个高大的声影，目光中充满了愤怒与悲伤。随后她低下了头，白发遮住了她的脸。{/n}

languages.text: 「異端者め…」{n}アルジェンタは奇妙な怒りと悲しみが混ざったまなざしで、背の高い人物を見る。 それから頭を下げ、その白髪が顔にかかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異端者め…」{n}アルジェンタは奇妙な怒りと悲しみが混ざったまなざしで、背の高い人物を見る。 それから頭を下げ、その白髪が顔にかかる。{/n}

languages.text: «Herejía...». {n}Argenta mira a la alta figura con una extraña mezcla de odio y tristeza. Luego agacha la cabeza y su blanco pelo le tapa la cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Heresy..." {n}Argenta looks at the tall figure with a strange mixture of anger and sadness. Then she lowers her head, and her white hair veils her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Herejía...». {n}Argenta mira a la alta figura con una extraña mezcla de odio y tristeza. Luego agacha la cabeza y su blanco pelo le tapa la cara.{/n}

languages.text: "Kâfirlik!" {n}Argenta, öfke ve hüznün tuhaf bir karışımıyla uzun boylu şahsa bakıyor. Ardından başını indiriyor ve beyaz saçları, yüzünü örtüyor.{/n}
